message: in terms of "injecting" code / skin into different app on iOS, i wouldn't bet on it. personally i don't mind games just use the original game center... although i hate openfeint, it's dog slow on my 3gs

I want to include GameCenter in a game, i know i can create my own interface, but i would like to include the default screens but with a "custom skin" so we can benefit from future updates... Is this possible?
not exactly what you just describe. but you can have a different view for game center. at least for achievements, i know PvZ do this.
Ok then, i think i'll go with the default view. Thanks.
